name: Lone (Demo)
description:
Controls

  • Jump / Double Jump - 'Space'
  • Slide - 'R'
  • Crouch - 'Shift'
  • Attack - 'E'
  • Bow - 'Q'

Goal: Pick up the cherries (15) and reach the end checkpoint to win.

This is a demo of a game that I'm most likely not going to continue working on (it's a relatively old project that I recently decided to "finish").
